field.name: description
field.value: The AspViewBase instanciate a new DictionaryAdapterFactory each time it is initialized.

comment.author: djhi
comment.text:
This patch integrate the IDictionaryAdapterFactory into the IMonoRailServices interface and its implementations.
The AspViewBase now obtain the IDictionaryAdapterFactory service from the engine context.

comment.author: leemhenson
comment.text: I think this broke RenderMailMessage, because there is no context supplied from the call from EmailTemplateService. I'll attach a patch that checks for a null context and instantiates a DAF if necessary. This may not be the optimal solution, maybe EmailTemplateService should supply a context?
